name: Dicey Arcanery
description:
Created for GMTK Game Jam 2022

Theme: Roll of Dice

------

Game summary:

You play as an arcanist demon hunter, who is surrounded by endless evil octahedron constructs. The only thing you can rely on is your trusty dice revolver, which shoots bullets with a roll of dice... Try to survive.

------

How to play:

WASD - move

Mouse left button - shoot

Mouse right button - store the dice roll as a spell, then cast with right mouse button

List of Spells:

1 - Quick roll to your aim position

2 - Engage an invincible shield for 3 seconds

3 - Freeze all enemies

4 - Release a (arcane) spiral barrage

5 - Throw a (magical) hand grenade to damage all enemies in a small area

6 - Shoot a (enchanted) penetrating sniper bullet through a line of enemies
